text: Dr. Judy Cheng provided excellent care, and I felt she went above and beyond in comparison to my previous dental experiences. She cleaned my teeth thoroughly, and I could feel the difference in how deep the cleaning was. She took the time to explain my dental situation in detail, making sure I fully understood and offering helpful advice. Her assistant Angeline was also very attentive and kind, which made the visit even more comfortable. The reception staffs were warm, friendly, and polite, completing the overall positive experience.

I had a great experience at Greenlife! Dr. Koh is an incredibly thoughtful and reassuring doctor. Before my surgery, he took the extra step to read up on similar cases to better prepare and ensure everything went smoothly‚Äîsomething I truly appreciated.
Ms. Jamie was equally impressive. She was meticulous with the prescriptions and even followed up to check how I was feeling. The assistant was also very friendly and made me feel comfortable throughout the visit. Overall, I felt well cared for by a professional and kind team. Highly recommend!

Review for Dr. Dennis Soh,
I went to clinic for dental treatment and teeth cleaning. He is an extremely meticulous and careful dentist. He checked every tooth carefully and was very gentle during the dental treatment process. I did not much pain or discomfort at all. After the session, he gave me some tips on improving dental health such as the proper type of toothbrush to use and what I can do to improve my dental health.

Dr Phay is very patient and experienced in his consultations for my denture and tooth implant over the last few years. He fixed my denture including making adjustments and repairs, and handled my implant sessions professionally.

The staff are also very friendly and helpful.

Have been with Greenlife at Yew Tee for many years and i like their efficient way of running things.

I had my first visit, and it was a great experience. Dr. Ben attended to me, and I must say he's excellent at what he does. He performed my wisdom tooth surgery, and I was impressed by the neatness of his stitches. Additionally, his explanations were clear and transparent, outlining all potential risks so I knew exactly what to expect. The nurses are also very polite. üëçüèª
